name: cloudamqp
description:
A Pulumi package for creating and managing CloudAMQP resources.

> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/cloudamqp/terraform-provider-cloudamqp)
> distributed under [MIT](https://mit-license.org/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi/pulumi-cloudamqp` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudamqp/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`cloudamqp/terraform-provider-cloudamqp` repo](https://github.com/cloudamqp/terraform-provider-cloudamqp/issues).

apikey.description: Key used to authentication to the CloudAMQP Customer API

baseurl.description: Base URL to CloudAMQP Customer website

provider.description:
The provider type for the cloudamqp package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

> This content is derived from https://github.com/cloudamqp/terraform-provider-cloudamqp/blob/master/website/docs/index.html.markdown.

apikey.description: Key used to authentication to the CloudAMQP Customer API

baseurl.description: Base URL to CloudAMQP Customer website

messageType.description: Message types (total, unacked, ready) of the queue to trigger the alarm

queueRegex.description: Regex for which queues to check

recipients.description: Identifiers for recipients to be notified.

timeThreshold.description: For how long (in seconds) the value_threshold should be active before trigger alarm

type.description:
Type of the alarm, valid options are: cpu, memory, disk_usage, queue_length, connection_count, consumers_count,
net_split

valueThreshold.description: What value to trigger the alarm for

vhostRegex.description: Regex for which vhost the queues are in

apikey.description: API key for the CloudAMQP instance

host.description: Host name for the CloudAMQP instance

nodes.description: Number of nodes in cluster (plan must support it)

plan.description: Name of the plan, valid options are: lemur, tiger, bunny, rabbit, panda, ape, hippo, lion

region.description: Name of the region you want to create your instance in

tags.description: Tag the instances with optional tags

vpcSubnet.description: Dedicated VPC subnet, shouldn't overlap with your current VPC's subnet
